name: Semo Alliance for Disability Independence, Inc.

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Semo Alliance for Disability Independence, Inc. is a Home Health provider based in Cape Girardeau, MO. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $27.4M in Medicaid payments across 568K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $27.4M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
